firstNightReminder: Show the character tokens of all Minions in play.
name: Exterminator
ability: You start knowing which Minions are in play.
flavor: Don't knock the power of a pest. Persistence and stubbornness can be useful in many situations.

firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of outsiders sat next to an evil player.
name: Customs Officer
ability: You start knowing how many outsiders are neighboring evil players. [+1 Outsider]
flavor: Have you filled in th proper forms?

name: Bounty Hunter
firstNightReminder: Point to 1 evil player. Wake the townsfolk who is evil and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign.
otherNightReminder: If the known evil player has died, point to another evil player.
ability: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]

firstNightReminder: Show the "This is the Demon" card. Point to the Demon.
name: Prophet
ability: You start knowing the Demon. If you are mad that that player is evil or that you are the Prophet, your team loses, even when dead.
flavor: A vision that was planted in my brain still remains...

otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal for the number of players that nominated a player of different alignment.
name: Messenger
ability: Each night*, you learn how many players nominated a player of different alignment.
flavor: Saying nothing is also saying something.

otherNightReminder: If the Hostess is marked with the "Talked to evil" reminder, they die.
name: Hostess
ability: If you are involved in a private conversation with an evil player, you die tonight.

name: Hoarder
ability: Each night, the Demon learns a good player & their character. If you die by execution, each of these players dies tonight in the order they were learned.
flavor: These are my things! I need them!

firstNightReminder: Replace the Bauble's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the "Is the Acolyte" reminder token (that player is still the good Acolyte). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Demon.
name: Acolyte
ability: The Demon has a not-in-play Minion ability.

otherNightReminder: If the Hatter is marked with the "Tea Party Tonight" reminder: Wake the Minion & Demon players. Show them the "This Character Selected You" info token, then the Hatter token. Each player either shakes their head no or points to another character of the same type as their current character. If a second player would end up with the same character as another player, shake your head no and gesture for them to choose again. Put them to sleep. Remove the "Tea Party Tonight" reminder. Change each player to the character they chose.
name: Hatter
ability: If you died today or tonight, the Minion & Demon players may choose new Minion & Demon characters to be.

otherNightReminder: Replace the Plague Doctor's character token with a not-in-play Minion token and mark it with the "Is the Plague Doctor" reminder token (that player is still the good Plague Doctor). When this Minion would normally act, the relevant choices are made by the Storyteller.
name: Plague Doctor
ability: If you die, the Storyteller gains a not-in-play Minion ability.

firstNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the "Chosen" reminder.
otherNightReminder: The Succubus points to a player. Mark that player with the "Chosen" reminder. If a player is marked with the "Talked" reminder, ask the Succubus if they want that player to die.
name: Succubus
ability: Each night, choose a player: if you have a private conversation with them tomorrow, you may choose to kill them that night.
flavor: Sometimes you wake up from a dream. Sometimes you wake up in a dream. And sometimes, every once in a while, you wake up in someone else's dream.

otherNightReminder: If no living player was executed during the day: The Cheesemonger points to player. That player dies.
name: Cheesemonger
ability: Each night*, if no living player was executed during the day, choose a player: they die.
flavor: What happens to the hole when the cheese is gone?

name: Organ Grinder
ability: All players keep their eyes closed when voting and the vote tally is secret. Votes for you only count if you vote.

firstNightReminder: When the first night has ended, declare that the Vizier is in play, and which player it is.
name: Vizier
ability: All players know who you are. You can not die during the day. If good voted, you may choose to execute immediately.

name: Leviathan
firstNightReminder: Place the Leviathan 'Day 1' marker. Announce 'The Leviathan is in play; this is Day 1.'
otherNightReminder: Change the Leviathan Day reminder for the next day.
ability: If more than 1 good player dies by execution, you win. All players know you are in play. After day 5, evil wins.**

firstNightReminder: At the start of the game, if there are any homebrew characters on the character sheet or you are running homebrew rules, declare that the Bootlegger is in play and inform the group of all the homebrew characters and/or rules you are using in this game.
name: Bootlegger
ability: This script has homebrew characters or rules.

name: Djinn
ability: Use the Djinn's special rule. All players know what it is. [**The Leviathan's ability has been modified.]
